sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";

function CreateDeckForm(){
    const [formData, setformData] = useState([]); /* Set form state to blank array*/

    return (
        <form>
              <label htmlFor="name">
              Name
            <input
                id="name"
                type="text"
                name="name"
                placeholder="Deck Name"
            />   
            </label>
            <label htmlFor="description">
            Description
            <textarea
                id="description"
                type="text"
                name="name"
                placeholder="Brief description of the deck"
            />   
            </label>

        </form>
    )
}


export default CreateDeckForm;
